ingredients.item: 4 rashers essential Waitrose unsmoked back bacon
½ tbsp essential Waitrose half fat mayonnaise

instructions.step: Cook the bacon under a preheated grill for 5-6 minutes, turning once until completely cooked.

Meanwhile, scrape the avocado flesh into a small bowl and smash with a fork to give a chunky texture. Stir in the mayonnaise, juice of half a lime and half the parsley, season and spread onto the toasted bagels.
Top with the bacon and sprinkle with remaining parsley. Serve with the other half of the lime.
